Funding Finder

Connecting small businesses to funding and assistance organizations in the greater Washington Area

Why Funding Finder

Funding Made Simple

Save your time searching for funding, we'll do all the heavy lifting

Diversity at the Forefront

Extensive research to ensure inclusivity

One Stop Shop

We've got resources, assistance, and funding options all in one place

Browse Funding & Assistance Options

Small businesses can view available funding and assistance. Funding are grants or loans. The assistance results consists of assistance orgs that have financial or technology experts.

Matching Form

Small businesses can fill it out and it will narrow down the funding and assistance organizations they match with. It helps them find the best matches for their business.

Library

The financial literacy library that has a plethora of external links to resources and information that will help users become financially literate and prepare them for applying to funding.

Commerce CMS

Commerce can edit the available assistance and funding an Administrator Content Management System. This will keep our funding and information up to date and relevant long after we have finished with capstone.
